column2: connections-total number of connections a given user makes:: brocon
resp_count-total number of unique IPs a given user interacts with:: brocon
frac_remote = remote/connections: fraction of remote connections:: brocon
frac_int = int_conn/connections: fraction of international connections
designated (if 0-omit; if greater than zero- multiply): # of designated countries connected with:: brocon
protocol -- weighted -- frac_low*low_weight + frac_med*med_weight + frac_high*high_weight:: brocon -- [will use results from NSL-KDD: udp:0.0476; icmp:0.111; tcp:0.8414]
service  -- simliar to above -- can't use NSL-KDD- will simply use inverse weights from brocon
if user has access to no assets other than email & the web
